STAT 545 Course Website
Assignment Lecture Slides Office Hours

Homework can be submitted to the Yinsen Miao’s mailbox at Duncan Hall DCH 1092. You can also compile your LaTeX and LyX to pdf and send it to me via ym11@rice.edu. Please do rename your pdf file as HWX_netid_firstname_lastname.pdf where X stands for the xth homework. If you don’t have a rice netid, please replace the netid with your institute name.

Please rename your filename properly as HWX_netid_firstname_lastname.pdf where X stands for the xth homework. In the subject of your e-mail, Please write something like Homework X Part II STAT 545.
